revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: (from line 3) Isaak son of Ision 12 talents Chairemon son of Ision 4 talents Firmus son of Dios 9 talents Doulos son of Pankrates 20 talents (or "slave of Pankrates") Valerius son of Demetrios 57 talents Neilos son of Aion 30 talents Anamon son of Heron 48 talents, 2,000 drachmas Isaak son of Ision 52 talents Chairemon son of Ision 7 talents Firmus son of Dios 20 talents Aion son of Antonius - talents Pekysis son of Taese 31 talents Isidoros son of Antonius - talents Apollonios son of Sotas 38 talents Valerius son of Demetrios 20 talents Hol son of Apollos 28 talents Pekysis son of Taesis 15 talents Chairemon son of Ision 57 talents Isidoros son of Antonios 30 talents Apollonios son of Sotas - talents Doulos son of Pankrates - talents (or "slave of Pankrates")

listBibl.bibl: P.Col. VII 132 Correction to line 7 by A. Pietersma, "The Second Century" 3 (1983) 120 and to lines 6 and 23 by J.A. Straus, ZPE 78 (1989) 148; plate, P.Col. VII, Microfiche 1
